violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Limit the number of people to less than or equal to 1000.

violations.description: No persons should be nearby unless they have badges of colors green, light blue, dark blue, purple, orange, black.
violations.recommendation: Ensure that only authorized personnel are in the restricted zone.

violations.description: Flag unattended bags, weapons, or unknown packages.
violations.recommendation: Inspect unattended items for security purposes.

violations.description: Flag any fighting, running, or aggressive gestures.
violations.recommendation: Report any aggressive behavior to security personnel.

violations.description: All persons in work zones must wear required PPE (hard hat, vest).
violations.recommendation: Ensure that all personnel are wearing the required PPE.

report.summary: The observation is non-compliant with several security rules. Please limit the number of people in a single zone to less than or equal to 1000 and ensure that only authorized personnel are present in the restricted zone. Also, flag any unattended bags, weapons, or unknown packages for inspection.
